content: 7 7 7 8 10 8 10 new stitches slip the next 53 55 57 60 62 65 67 69 74 80 89 95 stitches onto a spare circular needle stitch holder or piece of scrap yarn knit the remaining 40 42 45 47 49 51 54 56 61 65 71 75 stitches you now have a total of 170 180 190 200 210 220 230 240 260 280 300 320 live body stitches and 2 sets of 53 55 57 60 62 65 67 69 74 80 89 95 resting sleeve stitches body you will now continue to work in stockinette stitch i e knit all stitches until you 12 work measures 45 5 46 5 47 5 48 5 49 5 50 5 51 5 52 5 54 5 56 57 5 59 cm 18 18 5 18 75 19 25 19 5 20 20 25 20 75 21 5 22 22 75 23 5 in when measured from the mid-back cast-on edge or 5 cm 2 in shorter than your ideal length when you are happy with the length of your work change to a 3 5-mm circular needle with your preferred cord length and work 5 cm 2 in in 1x1 rib i e *knit 1 purl 1* i worked 12 rounds for reference if you would prefer to use a tubular cast-off which i strongly recommend you will need to work the following 2 rounds to set up the cast-off round 1 *knit 1 slip 1 purlwise wyif* to the end of the round round 2 *slip 1 purlwise wyib purl 1* to the end of the round cast off all stitches using the sewn part of the cast-off see techniques above if you would prefer to use a different cast-off method make sure to use something that is fairly elastic to ensure a comfortable fit around your hips sleeves repeat for both sides you will now resume working the sleeve stitches that have been resting slip the resting 53 55 57 60 62 65 67 69 74 80 89 95 sleeve stitches on to a 4 5-mm us 7 circular needles with a 40- or 60-cm 16- or 24-in cord whichever feels most comfortable for you is fine to begin work the following 2 rounds round 1 locate the mid-point of the underarm cast-on and from here pick up and knit 3 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 4 5 stitches pick up and knit 1 extra stitch from between the cast-on edge and the resting stitches knit the next 53 55 57 60 62 65 67 69 74 80 89 95 stitches and then again pick up and knit 1 extra stitch from between the resting stitches and the cast-on edge pick up and knit another 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 4 5 4 5 stitches place a new bor marker between the first and last stitch of the round round 2 slip bor marker knit 2
